mapper.select: SELECT STATUS,COUNT(1) STATUS_COUNT FROM TT_SCHEDULED_TRIGGER_LOG GROUP BY STATUS
SELECT STATUS,COUNT(1) STATUS_COUNT FROM TT_SCHEDULED_TRIGGER_LOG WHERE TRIGGER_NAME=#{triggerName} AND TRIGGER_GROUP=#{triggerGroup} GROUP BY STATUS
SELECT STATUS,COUNT(1) STATUS_COUNT FROM TT_SCHEDULED_TRIGGER_LOG WHERE JOB_NAME=#{jobName} AND JOB_GROUP=#{jobGroup} GROUP BY STATUS
SELECT LOGID,MSG,CREATE_DATE FROM TT_SCHEDULED_LOG ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM QRTZ_SCHEDULER_STATE ORDER BY LAST_CHECKIN_TIME DESC
SELECT * FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS WHERE TRIGGER_NAME=#{triggerName} AND TRIGGER_GROUP=#{triggerGroup} FOR UPDATE NOWAIT

SELECT A.*, B.DESCRIPTION,B.NEXT_FIRE_TIME,B.PREV_FIRE_TIME,B.PRIORITY,B.TRIGGER_STATE,B.TRIGGER_TYPE,B.START_TIME,B.END_TIME,B.CALENDAR_NAME,B.MISFIRE_INSTR,B.JOB_NAME,B.JOB_GROUP FROM QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS A LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS B ON A.TRIGGER_NAME=B.TRIGGER_NAME AND A.TRIGGER_GROUP=B.TRIGGER_GROUP WHERE A.TRIGGER_NAME=#{triggerName} AND A.TRIGGER_GROUP=#{triggerGroup}

SELECT A.*, B.DESCRIPTION,B.NEXT_FIRE_TIME,B.PREV_FIRE_TIME,B.PRIORITY,B.TRIGGER_STATE,B.TRIGGER_TYPE,B.START_TIME,B.END_TIME,B.CALENDAR_NAME,B.MISFIRE_INSTR,B.JOB_NAME,B.JOB_GROUP FROM QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS A LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS B ON A.TRIGGER_NAME=B.TRIGGER_NAME AND A.TRIGGER_GROUP=B.TRIGGER_GROUP WHERE A.TRIGGER_NAME=#{triggerName} AND A.TRIGGER_GROUP=#{triggerGroup}
SELECT SCHED_NAME,JOB_NAME,JOB_GROUP,DESCRIPTION,JOB_CLASS_NAME,IS_DURABLE,IS_NONCONCURRENT,IS_UPDATE_DATA,REQUESTS_RECOVERY FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS WHERE JOB_GROUP=#{jobGroup} and JOB_NAME=#{jobName}
